remarks: Negation law for X and Y sequences.  JonesMatijasevic is inconsistent on whether the X and Y sequences have domain ` NN0 ` or ` ZZ ` ; we use ` ZZ ` consistently to avoid the need for a separate subtraction law. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Sep-2014.)
statement: rmxyneg $p |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmX -u N ) = ( A rmX N ) /\ ( A rmY -u N ) = -u ( A rmY N ) ) ) $.
